name: Hi Mommy
description:
Made for Themed Horror Jam

Ms. Saki had a weird dream during her hospital stay, in which she encountered a ghastly figure claiming to be his daughter.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: movement, jump, drop down
  • Down key: interact

This is the first time ever making a horror game; ngl I wonder if this is horrifying enough to be classified as "horror" (^.^;

Hope you have fun!

Tools used:

  • Godot v3.2.3 and v3.4.5
  • FL Studio 20
  • Bfxr
  • Audacity v2.3.2
  • Aseprite v1.2.33
  • GIMP v2.10.20
